attributes.action: Take away the means tested part of carers allowance for all unpaid carers
attributes.additional_details: Unpaid carers are forgotten, cast into the shadows. Registered carers get paid in 2 hours what we get a week in C A.
attributes.background:
Mr Sunak, chancellor of the exchequer please can you make carers allowance non means tested.
It would be in line with DLA/PIP and allow unpaid carers to claim additional support like UC.
Give something back to the unpaid carers who have supported sick, disabled loved ones through this crisis.

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about carer's allowance, but we're not sure what you'd like happen. 

You might like to sign and share this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300032
